title: Best of The Program | Guests: Ric Grenell & Rep. Chris Stewart | 8/25/21
description:
Glenn broadcasts from an undisclosed location in the Middle East as the Nazarene Fund’s rescue mission continues. Glenn gives an update on the rescue mission and has a strong message for the State Department. Former ambassador Richard Grenell calls in to argue that the Afghanistan debacle isn’t an intelligence failure. Rep. Chris Stewart joins to describe just how “historic” this failure is and a possible Havana syndrome attack near VP Kamala Harris.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
